txt.en: 'We have had word from our kindred in the Great River of a heroic traveller who passed through Stangard. I can see that you are this same [placeholder] of whom such praise was spoken.\n\n'The Thane of Langhold would receive you in the Mead Hall without delay. This part of the Wold welcomes guests with open arms, but enemies of the Mark beware! It is my duty to warn you thus.'

'Ah... the famous wandering [placeholder]! Your reputation precedes you, [placeholder]. I bid you welcome to Langhold. I am sure you will find plenty to keep you busy here, for we are often beset by ruffians and wild creatures.'
'You should be able to find the Mead Hall without getting too lost. It is only the largest structure in Langhold.'
You have received a summons to go to Rohan, and the first city you encountered here was Langhold.
Receive the formal welcome of the Thane
Thane Utred, leader of the northernmost town of the Wold, is in the Mead Hall of Langhold.\n\nYou should speak with Thane Utred at once to receive a proper welcome to the town.
